snippet: The N.H.L. Winter Classic will come to Michigan Stadium and Comerica Park in 2013, pitting the Detroit Red Wings against the Toronto Maple Leafs.
abstract: The N.H.L. Winter Classic will come to Michigan Stadium and Comerica Park in 2013, pitting the Detroit Red Wings against the Toronto Maple Leafs.

headline.main: 2013 Winter Classic Set for Michigan Stadium
